docs.lead_paragraph: Just a short while ago, the House passed an expansion of the State Children's Health Insurance Program (known as SCHIP), on a largely party-line vote of 289-139.
docs.abstract: The Senate also is expected to move quickly on expanding insurance coverage for children, which would send a bill to the incoming president's desk shortly after he arrives at the White House.
docs.snippet: The Senate also is expected to move quickly on expanding insurance coverage for children, which would send a bill to the incoming president's desk shortly after he arrives at the White House.

docs.lead_paragraph: What once looked like a gleaming example of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg's financial skill -- the Yankee Stadium deal -- is suddenly looking like one of his biggest vulnerabilities. State lawmakers have subpoenaed team and city officials to an emergency hearing on Wednesday in advance of a vote scheduled for Friday on whether to extend $372 million in additional tax-free financing for the stadium.

headline.main: Criticism of Yankee Stadium Deal Mounts
